name: Planet Tower Defense (Chariot Rider)
description:
Planter Tower Defense is a 3D Tower Defense game created in 36 hours for the 2022 Hatchlings Game Jam.  Collect resources to build your defenses and upgrade your ship.  Be fast!  Night is quickly approaching, and with it come the goons.  Be resourceful, and be prepared.  Upgrade your ship three times and you will be able to leave Planet Tower Defense to explore new planets.  

Credits

Alex Reed - Programming and Game Design

Anthony Ruffalo - Programming and Game Design

Fisher Heins - Programming, Game Design, and Art 

Peter Roberts - Music and Sound Mixing

PULSAR BYTES - Skybox

Note:

Because this game was made in 36 hours, there are some rough edges.  In particular, the turret placement camera snaps to a particular point whenever the player right clicks.  The game is playable and beatable, but it has rough edges.
